item.title: RT Prashant Dixit: Talk with Wikipedia Pages You can talk to Wikipedia Pages by giving a topic I used 📖@Wikipedia library to get information about ...
item.description:
RT Prashant Dixit
Talk with Wikipedia Pages
You can talk to Wikipedia Pages by giving a topic

I used
📖@Wikipedia library to get information about a topic
💽 Embedded Pages using @OpenAI and stored in @lancedb

Other Technologies used 👇

item.title: RT Ajay Krupal K.: Wrote a few articles on @LangChainAI, along with code a few days ago, if you still haven't read it: Basics of LangChain: https://de...
item.description:
RT Ajay Krupal K.
Wrote a few articles on @LangChainAI, along with code a few days ago, if you still haven't read it:

Basics of LangChain: https://dev.to/ajaykrupalk/langchain-framework-for-llms-5hjf
Chatting with a PDF (Part-1): https://dev.to/ajaykrupalk/langchainjs-chatting-with-a-pdf-h51
Chatting with a PDF (Part-2): https://dev.to/ajaykrupalk/cont-langchainjs-chatting-with-a-pdf-42gk

#learning #LLMs #Reading

item.title: RT cohere: Tomorrow marks the beginning of the Cohere x @NYSE hackathon. Thanks to the NYSE for collaborating with us and with our AI partners at @wea...
item.description:
RT cohere
Tomorrow marks the beginning of the Cohere x @NYSE hackathon. Thanks to the NYSE for collaborating with us and with our AI partners at @weaviate_io, @LangChainAI, and @lablabai for their contributions to the event. We can't wait to see the innovative projects that will come out!
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Sopandev Tewari: Extract posts on interested topics from your X feed 😎 ✍️ Specify topics of interest 🕑 Run the automation 📔 Get post sum...
item.description:
RT Sopandev Tewari
Extract posts on interested topics from your X feed 😎

✍️ Specify topics of interest
🕑 Run the automation
📔 Get post summary and URLs

Built in just a few hours using LangGraph 🦜🕸️ by @LangChainAI! 👏

Really excited to explore and build many more tools using LangGraph 🏗️


LangChain: 🦜🕸️LangGraph

We introduced LangGraph last week, but are excited to launch it more officially today (blog and YouTube series). It includes:

🤖Example of replicating the LangChain AgentExecutor
💬A chat agent executor (aimed specifically at chat models)

LangGraph makes it easy…

item.title: RT Prince Canuma: Super pumped to share some cool news! 🌟🚀 This Tuesday, I gave a talk about RAGOps (Advanced Retrieval Strategies with @OpenAI,...
item.description:
RT Prince Canuma
Super pumped to share some cool news! 🌟🚀

This Tuesday, I gave a talk about RAGOps (Advanced Retrieval Strategies with @OpenAI, @LangChainAI and @supabase) at the OpenAI Devs meetup at none other than @Microsoft's HQ in Warsaw!

item.description:
RT Jordan Gilliam
Launching the first cult template today 🤌
http://cult-vector.com

Built with
✅ @supabase db, auth, vec
✅ @LangChainAI vec docs
✅ @shadcn ui
✅ @nextjs 14 framework

Manifest is perplexity but for your own files.

The preview is “trained” on supabase, langchain and and…

item.title: OpenAI recently released a new embedding model Check out @mesudarshan's awesome new video on how to use them as part of LangChain!
item.description:
OpenAI recently released a new embedding model

Check out @mesudarshan's awesome new video on how to use them as part of LangChain!


Sudarshan Koirala: ✨ OpenAI V3 Embeddings with LangChain ✨

Just uploaded a video about new @OpenAI embeddings model and how to easily implement it with @LangChainAI

Youtube: https://youtu.be/ssgvViL0fao

#langchain #openai #llm #embeddingsmodel #ai

item.title: RT Brendan Burke: Good reference architecture for a banking agent app by @McKinsey / @iguazio for: Multiple databases: @milvusio for multi-cloud vecto...
item.description:
RT Brendan Burke
Good reference architecture for a banking agent app by @McKinsey / @iguazio for:

Multiple databases: @milvusio for multi-cloud vector DB and @Redisinc for structured data

@LangChainAI for orchestration of @OpenAI models

@nuclioio for serving

@EvidentlyAI for monitoring
item.author: LangChain

item.title: While the space is still new, we're starting to see a few common patterns and trends emerge, especially around RAG We've teamed up with our friends at...
item.description:
While the space is still new, we're starting to see a few common patterns and trends emerge, especially around RAG

We've teamed up with our friends at @DataStax to try to codify some of them!


DataStax: Your guide to LLM agent reference architecture is here! 📍🗺 We teamed up with @LangChainAI to provide:

◆ Common Gen AI design patterns and use cases
◆ In-depth architectural examples
◆ Important considerations to keep in mind

Grab your copy ➡️https://dtsx.io/3vP8hiP
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: Some fun updates to OpenGPTs! Add 3 different "cognitive architectures": - Assistant - RAG - Chatbot We have a simple hosted versio...
item.description:
RT Harrison Chase
Some fun updates to OpenGPTs!

Add 3 different "cognitive architectures":

- Assistant
- RAG
- Chatbot

We have a simple hosted version ("research preview") to play around with here: https://opengpts-example-vz4y4ooboq-uc.a.run.app/


LangChain: 🦜🤖OpenGPTs Updates

Some big updates to OpenGPTs!

⭐️Reminder: OpenGPTs is an open source version of the GPT store where you can fully control the model used, the tools used, the retrieval strategy

Blog + YouTube to dive into more detail!

❓What are the updates?

🕸️LangGraph:…

RT Brace
📊 Revamped SQL Use Cases

We've just released revamped SQL use case docs for @LangChainAI JS/TS 🦜🔗
The updated docs contain sections on building SQL agents, prompting strategies, dealing with large production databases, and more!

We're putting a lot more effort into our more…
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: Excited to get more devs building with the @CloudflareDev ⛅️ + @LangChainAI JS/TS 🦜🔗! There's even a full example RAG app that s...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
Excited to get more devs building with the @CloudflareDev ⛅️ + @LangChainAI JS/TS 🦜🔗!

There's even a full example RAG app that serves a @nuxt_js + @vuejs app entirely from a Cloudflare Worker.

Ingest into Vectorize included! See the blog for more:

https://blog.cloudflare.com/langchain-support-for-workers-ai-vectorize-and-d1/


Ricky: If you're building AI applications with @LangChainAI (and you should be!), it's now even easier to integrate with @CloudflareDev Workers AI, Vectorize and D1! 🎉🎉🎉

(Thanks to @Hacubu and the @LangChainAI team for being so rad!)

https://blog.cloudflare.com/langchain-support-for-workers-ai-vectorize-and-d1/

item.title: RT Robert Nishihara: This is the first hands-on, intensive, two-day bootcamp for learning to build RAG applications. Cohosted by @pinecone and @anysca...
item.description:
RT Robert Nishihara
This is the first hands-on, intensive, two-day bootcamp for learning to build RAG applications.

Cohosted by @pinecone and @anyscalecompute (also featuring lessons from experts at @LangChainAI, @vercel, and others).

Nearly every AI application will be a RAG application, and…


Anyscale: Ready to hear from #RAG experts at @LangChainAI @vercel @pinecone @anyscalecompute and get hands-on with intensive guided trainings? The 2-day RAG Developer Bootcamp is for you! Learn more & register now 👉https://hubs.ly/Q02j9QmW0

#llm #ml #rag #ai #vectordatabase #ray #pinecone
